results.description: Data manipulation tools r... Data API builder overview Configuration file structure Role-based access control SQL MCP Server is Microsoft's open-source solution for bringing AI agents into your data workflows. Built on Data API builder's proven entity abstraction, RBAC, and telemetry, SQL MCP Server provides a production-ready surface that works.
